original_title: Baby Einstein: Baby Van Gogh - World of Colors
overview: This unique video, starring "Vincent Van Goat," introduces babies and toddlers to basic colors through charming puppetry, timeless art, live-action footage, classical music and child-friendly poetry. Includes images of Van Gogh's most famous ... Full Descriptionpaintings. Featuring child-friendly arrangements of music by Brahms, Ravel, Strauss, Tchaikovsky and others.
title: Baby Einstein: Baby Van Gogh - World of Colors
